item.title: CVE-2024-35699|2024-06-10T19:51:16.755Z -- hasthemes -- ht%20feed
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HasThemes HT Feed allows Stored XSS.This issue affects HT Feed: from n/a through 1.2.8.
